page.title: 04Ecology
page.content: ECOLOGY IN THE DELABOLE AREA. { Our weather(1).}By Gary Blanchard. At Delabole school we have been keeping a check on the weather and have made charts since September 1980. {TEMPERATURE.}From our charts we have discovered on average we only have 12 days in a year below 0. We have found out that the{coldest months}in the year are generally November,December and January but winter can be mild.The {hottest months}are June,July and August. The average maximum temperature is 31 C.These are the months holiday visitors come. In the summer the weather is most right for swimming in July and August and is right for a good suntan which we all love.in the winter we can get heavy rain but as far as I remember we have only had{snow}in two of the last 5 years,and not much then.
